content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with The White Suit, the November 5, 1950, episode of Tales Of The Texas Rangers.

(30:15) Our second story comes from WHItehall-1212. We hear The Murder Of Peter Amory, their episode from February 24, 1952.

Download CaseClosed768

As the end of this year closes in, please consider a donation to help fund another year (our 15th!) of Relic Radio. More information at donate.relicradio.com. Thank you to all who’ve helped out over the years!
